title: How’s the Quarantine Going, America? | 4/6/20
description:
The surgeon general warned Americans that this week may be our coronavirus “Pearl Harbor” moment, but Glenn wants to hear from listeners like you: How are you coping? The mayor of Los Angeles announced that snitches get … rewards? Infected UK Prime Minister Boris Johnson was admitted to the hospital, while the Queen gave a rare address to the people. Glenn has a warning for Americans: The proposed coronavirus “cure” is nothing short of socialism and slavery to global collectivism. In today’s COVID-19 update, we’re using fewer hospital beds than predicted, the New York Times has a shocking claim about U.S. deaths, and the Obama administration DID deplete the national stockpile of N95 masks. And how many businesses have actually closed?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
